prompts: Create a whimsical psychic-type Pokemon with soft ears and a gentle expression.
I want a Pokemon that embodies kindness, with a cute design and friendly features.
Generate a fairy Pokemon with a playful demeanor and charming attributes.
Make a small, bipedal Pokemon that has a soothing appearance and pastel colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that looks like a plush toy, with oversized features and bright eyes.
Design a Pokemon that radiates joy, with a round body and fluffy tail.
Give me a character that can support allies in battle, with a unique psychic ability.
